scopes.https://func-voiceservice-rp-prod-eastus: Grants the associated roles assigned to the client application

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

parameters.name: maxpagesize
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to include in a single response. Defaults to 200, and must not exceed 500.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: An offset into the collection of the first record to be returned.

x-ms-error-code.description: Error code for specific error that occurred.

get.description: Gets a list of the numbers assigned to the specified account. Response pagination can be controlled with a combination of the maxpagesize and skip parameters. Limit the number of records in a response with the maxpagesize parameter. Specify the starting record using the skip parameter.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Batch of numbers to create or replace.

x-ms-error-code.description: Error code for specific error that occurred.

post.description: Adds or replaces between 1 and 100 numbers (inclusive) in the specified account. In the body, specify a list of phone numbers and and the corresponding details (for example, the services to enable) for each number. This operation is atomic; if any item fails, then all items fail.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

parameters.name: phoneNumber
parameters.description: Phone number in E.164 format.

x-ms-error-code.description: Error code for specific error that occurred.

delete.description: Removes the specified number from the specified account.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

parameters.name: phoneNumber
parameters.description: Phone number in E.164 format.

x-ms-error-code.description: Error code for specific error that occurred.

get.description: Gets the details of a number assigned to an account, including the services for which the number is enabled.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

parameters.name: phoneNumber
parameters.description: Phone number in E.164 format.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: Makes a request conditional on a matching etag.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Makes a request conditional on a non-matching etag.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: New details of the number to create or replace.

x-ms-error-code.description: Error code for specific error that occurred.

put.description: Creates or replaces the specified number in the specified account. In the body of the request, include the service for which this number is enabled. If the service is not specified, Operator Connect service is enabled by default. Optionally, include additional configuration for the number.

parameters.name: maxpagesize
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to include in a single response. Defaults to 200, and must not exceed 500.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: An offset into the collection of the first record to be returned.

x-ms-error-code.description: Error code for specific error that occurred.

get.description: Gets a list of account records. An account represents a customer to which you are providing service. Response pagination can be controlled with a combination of the maxpagesize and skip parameters. Limit the number of records in a response with the maxpagesize parameter. Specify the starting record using the skip parameter.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

x-ms-error-code.description: Error code for specific error that occurred.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Additionally return the provisioning state of the backends configured for this account (e.g. DNS subdomain provisioning for Microsoft Teams Direct Routing).

x-ms-error-code.description: Error code for specific error that occurred.

get.description: Gets the details of the specified account. An account represents a customer.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the account. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes, and is case-sensitive. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: Makes a request conditional on a matching etag.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Makes a request conditional on a non-matching etag.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: New details of the account to create or replace.

x-ms-error-code.description: Error code for specific error that occurred.

put.description: Creates or replaces the specified account, representing a customer. In the body of the request, include additional service-specific configuration. For example, for Microsoft Teams Direct Routing, specify the customer-specific subdomain label and DNS TXT values from the customer's Microsoft 365 configuration.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Query information for a specific number.

parameters.name: maxpagesize
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to include in a single response. Defaults to 200, and must not exceed 500.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: An offset into the collection of the first record to be returned.

x-ms-error-code.description: Error code for specific error that occurred.

get.description: Gets a list of all configured numbers across all accounts. Response pagination can be controlled with a combination of the maxpagesize and skip parameters. Limit the number of records in a response with the maxpagesize parameter. Specify the starting record using the skip parameter.

etag.description: ETag for use with If-Match headers for optimistic concurrency.

AccountResponse.description: Details of the account as returned on a GET request.

nextLink.description: Link to the next page of results.

AccountsList.description: Paginated list of records for an account.

etag.description: ETag for use with If-Match headers for optimistic concurrency.

AccountWithStatusResponse.description: Details of the account and its DNS provisioning status as returned on a GET request.

phoneNumber.description: The E.164 phone number whose record should be created/replaced.

BatchNumbersResponse.description: List of created or replaced numbers.

customSipHeader.description: Contents of the custom SIP header to use with this number. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes. Can be up to 100 characters in length. The name of the custom header is set as part of deploying Azure Communications Gateway.

etag.description: ETag for use with If-Match headers for optimistic concurrency.

accountName.description: Account name which owns this number.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number corresponding to this entry.

NumberResponse.description: Details of the number as returned on a GET request.

value.description: Number of records for the page.

nextLink.description: Link to the next page of results.

teamsDrEnabled.description: Enables/disables Microsoft Teams Direct Routing for the number.

teamsOcEnabled.description: Enables/disables Operator Connect for the number.

NumberServices.description: Communications services enabled for this number.

SubdomainProvisioningState.description: Status of DNS configuration and the DNS TXT values for the DNS records

SubdomainProvisioningStatus.description: Status of DNS configuration. Azure Communications Gateway generates DNS records to Microsoft 365 to verify that the customer-specific domain name is associated with the correct customer tenant.

values.description: DNS state has not been provisioned.
values.name: NotProvisioned

values.description: The programmed DNS state doesn't match the requested programming.
values.name: Inconsistent

callScreening.description: Enables/disables caller ID screening for the account. Caller ID screening is enabled by default.

subdomain.description: Customer-specific domain name label. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes. Can be up to 10 characters in length.

TeamsDrConfig.description: Account configuration relating to Microsoft Teams Direct Routing.

region1Token.description: DNS TXT value for the first region, as provided by the customer from their Microsoft 365 Admin Center. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

region2Token.description: DNS TXT value for the first region, as provided by the customer from their Microsoft 365 Admin Center. Can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes. Can be up to 100 characters in length.

TeamsDrSubdomainTokens.description: DNS TXT values (tokens) for the account.

ErrorResponse.title: Error details.
ErrorResponse.description: Contains details when the response code indicates an error.

ErrorDetail.title: The code and message for an error.

message.description: A human readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information about the error.

additionalProperties.description: Additional properties that can be provided about the error.

InnerError.title: More specific information on an error object.

innererror.description: Inner error details if they exist.
